name: StarTech PCI300WN2X2 802.11a/b/g/n PCI Wi-Fi Adapter
Features: [2 Transmitter/2 Receiver (2x2:2) antenna configuration, Compliant with IEEE 802.11n standard, with support for up to 300Mbps of wireless data bandwidth, Backward compatible with IEEE 802.11b/g standards for up to 11/54Mbps connections respectively with Wireless-B and Wireless-G networks, Supported security features: WEP (64-128-bit), WPA, WPA2, WPS, Support for WMM/WMM-PS Quality of Service (QoS), Infrastructure and Ad-Hoc network modes support, Dual detachable 2dBi antennas, Includes Low Profile/Half-Height installation bracket]
